To answer some of the questions... as of yesterday: 
1.  November 9th it will have it's official announcement
2.  It will feature a quad-core NVIDIA chipset, a 10-inch﻿ display, USB and mini-HDMI ports, SD card slot, and be 8.3mm thick.
3.  Not only should it sport the ICS OS... but there IS a strong possibility that ICS will be available for the existing Transformer!  (The later should be made official on Nov. 9th)

Have a wonderful, large yellow smiley day!

There may be more demand than there is supply. But for a tablet like this, it's﻿ worth waiting for.
